row.special_powers: [ { "type": "trait", "name": "JUST BECAUSE YOU HIRED ME, DOESN'T MAKE US FRIENDS", "description": "Taskmaster doesn't count against themed teams" }, { "type": "trait", "name": "I MEMORIZED MOVES FROM DOZENS OF CHUMPS, TAKE YOUR BEST SHOT!", "description": "FREE: Choose two: Charge, Flurry, Running Shot, Blades/Claws/Fangs, Incapacitate, Penetrating/Psychic Blast, Precision Strike, Combat Reflexes, Energy Shield/Deflection, Close Combat Expert, Exploit Weakness, Ranged Combat Expert. Taskmaster can use the chosen powers until your next turn. This turn, characters targeted by Taskmaster with an attack can't use the chosen powers until your next turn.", "powers": [ "charge", "flurry", "running_shot", "blades_claws_fangs", "incapacitate", "penetrating_psychic_blast", "precision_strike", "combat_reflexes", "energy_shield_deflection", "close_combat_expert", "exploit_weakness", "ranged_combat_expert" ] } ]

Cosmic Cube
row.special_powers: [ { "name": "EFFECT", "description": "FREE: An opponent chooses Speed, Attack, Defense, or Damage and you then choose a standard power that isn't of the chosen type. Until your next turn, as long as the Cosmic Cube is equipped, modify the combat value of the type chosen by your opponent +1 and this character can use the power you chose. At the end of your turn, roll a d6 if this character doesn't have the Cosmic keyword. [1-2]: Unequip the Cosmic Cube.", "powers": [ "flurry", "leap_climb", "phasing_teleport", "earthbound_neutralized", "charge", "mind_control", "plasticity", "force_blast", "sidestep", "hypersonic_speed", "stealth", "running_shot", "blades_claws_fangs", "energy_explosion", "pulse_wave", "quake", "super_strength", "incapacitate", "penetrating_psychic_blast", "smoke_cloud", "precision_strike", "poison", "steal_energy", "telekinesis", "super_senses", "toughness", "defend", "combat_reflexes", "energy_shield_deflection", "barrier", "mastermind", "willpower", "invincible", "impervious", "regeneration", "invulnerability", "ranged_combat_expert", "battle_fury", "support", "exploit_weakness", "enhancement", "probability_control", "shape_change", "close_combat_expert", "empower", "perplex", "outwit", "leadership" ] } ]

row.special_powers: [ { "name": "EFFECT", "description": "FREE: Choose a standard power, then roll a d6. [5-6]: You may choose an additional standard power. [1-2]: Deal this character 1 unavoidable damage. This character can use the chosen power(s) until your next turn.", "powers": [ "flurry", "leap_climb", "phasing_teleport", "earthbound_neutralized", "charge", "mind_control", "plasticity", "force_blast", "sidestep", "hypersonic_speed", "stealth", "running_shot", "blades_claws_fangs", "energy_explosion", "pulse_wave", "quake", "super_strength", "incapacitate", "penetrating_psychic_blast", "smoke_cloud", "precision_strike", "poison", "steal_energy", "telekinesis", "super_senses", "toughness", "defend", "combat_reflexes", "energy_shield_deflection", "barrier", "mastermind", "willpower", "invincible", "impervious", "regeneration", "invulnerability", "ranged_combat_expert", "battle_fury", "support", "exploit_weakness", "enhancement", "probability_control", "shape_change", "close_combat_expert", "empower", "perplex", "outwit", "leadership" ] } ]
